item.title: How can u chnage max stat and cb lvl
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

you would do that in method that generates the Level for stats of the XP you provide it…

method getLevelForXP. would require you to change 2 things…

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { change the 99 to 200 (if you want max stat to be 200

It will take a long time to level to 200 though also a bit lower you see

return 99; change the 99 to 200 to return 200;.

if you leave the first change you changed to 200 with the int lvl = 1; lvl <=99 if you don’t change this 99 to 200 after you hit lvl 99 on 1 stat and try to go for lvl 100… it will jump from 99 to 200… because it can’t find the XP. So which way do you want it? lvl 99,100,101,102… etc or 99 … 200 ? your pick…

Read full topic
